column1: There were 2 charges in the indictment. They are as follows;

column2: that during the period of 01.06.1998 - 04.06.1998 within the jurisdiction of this court at
Thalangama  North  the  1st  and  the  2nd  accused  voluntarily  caused  hurt  to  Withana
Arachchilage  Chamila  Priyadarshani  Pushpakumari  and  thereby  committed  an  offence
punishable under section 315 of the Penal Code read with section 32 of the Penal Code.
